original: FERIEN, Axel Hugo, Vilhelm, Disponent, Fristad, f N Solberga, Jkps l, 8/1 91 av godsäg A Ph F o Anna Maria Törnlund, gm Marianne Westermark. Studex 09, hdlshögsk 18—19, Versuchs- u Lehranst f Brauerei Berlin 36—37. Riksbkstjm 10—19, disp AB Hov-juv K Anderson Gbg 19—31, disp AB Nya bryggeriet i Borås sed. 32. Styr.led i sistn AB, Kinna BryggeriAB, AB Borås Nya kork-fabr, AB Kvarteret Priamus, AB Svenljunga hotel, Borås o Sjuhäradsbygdens konstfrn, Riksfrn f Bildande Konst. Ag sockenhemm Näbben, Fristad. Resor: Engl, Frankr, Tyskl mfl länd v öl tillf 20—39. °FEBM, Torsten Bror Anker, Direktör, Göteborg, f Bovallstrand 9/7 90 av skeppare o sal-teriidk A F o h h, f Niklasdotter, gm Maria Olsson. Efter avslutad skolgång stud v Thörn-qvistska Handelsskolan i Borås 07, militär-anst v Älvsborgs reg 08—10 o genomg dess uoff.skola 10. Distr.chef f Försäkr.bol Framtiden 10—17. Start Ferms Regnkläders Fabrik, Gbg, 15 o överlät den 18. Kont.chef h AB C A Wallén, Gbg, 20—28. Start AB Svenska Varor, Gbg, 26, vkst dir där sed. dess. Ordf i Bo-vallsstrands munic.nmd o brandstyr 19—20, v. ordf i komm.stämman o brandchef där samma år. Medl NTO,
translated:
FERIEN, Axel Hugo, Vilhelm, Manager, Fristad, born in Solberga, Jkpg, on January 8, 1891, to estate owner A Ph F and Anna Maria Törnlund, married Marianne Westermark. Graduated in 1909, attended business school from 1918 to 1919, and studied at the Experimental and Teaching Institute for Brewing in Berlin from 1936 to 1937. Worked at Riksbank from 1910 to 1919, manager at AB Hov-juv K Anderson in Gothenburg from 1919 to 1931, manager at AB Nya bryggeriet i Borås since 1932. Board member of various companies, including AB, Kinna Bryggeri AB, AB Borås Nya korkfabr, AB Kvarteret Priamus, AB Svenljunga hotel, Borås, and Sjuhäradsbygdens konstfrn. Member of the National Association of Visual Arts. Resided at Näbben, Fristad. Traveled to England, France, Germany, and other countries for business between 1920 and 1939.

FEBM, Torsten Bror Anker, Director, Gothenburg, born in Bovallstrand on July 9, 1890, to ship captain and merchant A F and h h, born Niklasdotter, married Maria Olsson. After completing school, studied at Thörnqvistska Handelsskolan in Borås in 1907, attended military school at Älvsborg regiment from 1908 to 1910, and completed its officer school in 1910. District manager at Framtiden Insurance Company from 1910 to 1917. Started Ferms Rain Gear Factory in Gothenburg in 1915 and sold it in 1918. Administrative manager at AB C A Wallén in Gothenburg from 1920 to 1928. Started AB Svenska Varor in Gothenburg in 1926 and has been the managing director since then. Chairman of the municipal committee and fire brigade in Bovallstrand from 1919 to 1920, vice chairman of the municipal council and fire chief in the same year. Member of NTO.

structured.name: Axel Hugo Vilhelm Ferien

education.name: Experimental and Teaching Institute for Brewing

memberOf: The National Association of Visual Arts
structured.note: Resided in other countries for business purposes between 1920 and 1939.
